data.title: Great place to hang out and watch the game!
data.text: If your looking for a place to have a drink with friends and catch the night's game, this is the perfect place to go! Friendly staff and excellent service!

data.title: After 3 try I stopped  going...
data.text: SportsZone would be alright. The worst part about the place is the bartender. He's just a complete inconsiderate disrespectful individual. He has zero desire to work for his money. He is definitely the most lazy, worthless  excuse of a man that could possibly run the place. He completely ruins the hole experience. If you're looking for somewhere that you can hang out with some friends and shoot some pool or play some games and just chill and enjoy some drinks SportsZone is not the place you're looking for. The place is poorly managed and the bartender dose his job with the least amount of effort,resulting in inadequate performances, plus he's the only bartender(Zero professionalism)...Don't waste your time or money.
